item.title: Direct-Scoring NLG Evaluators Can Use Pairwise Comparisons Too
item.description: arXiv:2509.05440v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: As large-language models have been increasingly used as automatic raters for evaluating free-form content, including document summarization, dialog, and story generation, work has been dedicated to evaluating such models by measuring their correlation...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> context, in-context, summarization, RAG, arxiv | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (arXiv)
